TASK: Craft an item of type: purple_stained_glass

thought: To craft purple_stained_glass, I need to place glass and purple dye in a particular pattern on the crafting grid. Since there is glass at slot 29, I will move one unit of it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1
